Shalizar Properties page-architecture proposal

Wireframe document, proposed page layout, content, and website architecture

Shalizar Properties LTD.

Shalizar Properties LTD. is a real estate development and investment firm in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

Proposal Wireframe

Craig Webb worked with Shalizar Properties LTD to determine the website architecture and required content. Craig created a wireframe document as a proposal to portray the required content and functions for each page.

Shalizar Properties Landowner Page

The wireframes show the page navigation, content and features for each page. Styles are avoided so that clients focus on what assets are needed on the page.

Shalizar Properties Project Page

Shalizar Properties LTD provided assets for their website including copy, images of apt. floor plans & maps, and their logo.

Website Design

The clean website presentation is designed to support the client’s brand and content and evoke a sense of sophistication and reliability.

Front-End Development

This website is a very-early HTML5/CSS3 website, utilizing all of the new eye-candy, cross-browser fixes, fallbacks and progressive enhancements of the time.
